MissionsCredited.label: Number of Missions Credited
MissionsCredited.help: Number of missions credited for each actually flown

PilotInjury.label: Select Max Pilot Injury
PilotInjury.help: 1 = No Injury, 2 = Minor Wound, 3 = Major Wound 4 = Death

DetailedVictoryDescription.label: Use detailed victory description
DetailedVictoryDescription.help: 0 = Use fog of war victory description, 1 = Use detailed victory description

ShowAllUnitsInBreifing.label: Show all flights in briefing
ShowAllUnitsInBreifing.help: Intended for debugging.  Would be a cheat in the game

RemoveNonHistoricalSquadrons.label: Remove non historical squadrons
RemoveNonHistoricalSquadrons.help: Non historical squadrons will not be included in missions

SaveStupidAi.label: Save AI From Itself
SaveStupidAi.help: AI pilots will only be killed in a mission if shot down
